Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Slavers and pirates are hiding in the north area of Mistmoor Island, waiting to attack anyone who wanders past.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:12#7#gula brawlers}, {@LinkCreature:12#8#Red Lash killers} and {@LinkCreature:12#9#butchers}, and {@LinkCreature:12#11#island kamaras}.

Report to Coordinator Lisel when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
